examples.en: You look dead beat.
You can't beat the system.
Beat the eggs into the flour.
The drums beat all night.
He was questioned and beaten.
Beat the eggs, then add the milk.
I beat the traffic.
I'm beat.
Her heart was beating fast.
This beats me!
The rain beat against the windows.
Let me sit down. I'm absolutely beat!
examples.ru: Позвольте мне сесть. Я совершенно измотан!

examples.en: They're a hard team to beat.
The waves beat against the rocks.
The team was beaten for the second time.
The rain beat on the roof.
Nothing beats homemade cake.
examples.ru: С домашним пирогом ничто не сравнится.

examples.en: He beat his breast in anger.
examples.ru: Разозлившись, он ударил себя в грудь.

examples.en: This sure beats work!
We beat the competition.
I've never seen his beat.
examples.ru: Он бесподобен. / Никогда не видел никого, подобного ему.

examples.en: We beat them ten to nothing.
examples.ru: Мы разгромили их со счётом десять — ноль.

examples.en: It's raining to beat the band.
Sid beat on the door with his hand.
They beat us good and proper.
examples.ru: Они разбили нас в пух и прах.

examples.en: The even beat of the drum
We beat 'em good and proper.
examples.ru: Мы задали им хорошую трёпку. / Мы разбили их в пух и прах.

examples.en: Shop now and beat the Christmas rush!
examples.ru: Купите подарки прямо сейчас, успейте до Рождественской лихорадки!

examples.en: Gradually beat in the sugar.
Beat out this tune on a drum.
